summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, repealing Chapter 23.62, amending Sections 23.20.008, 23.24.040, 23.28.030, 23.42.042, 23.44.008, 23.44.010, 23.44.014, 23.44.024, 23.44.034, 23.45.014, 23.45.056, 23.45.072, 23.52.010, 23.53.015, 23.53.020, 23.53.030, 23.70.010, 23.76.032, 23.84.010, 23.84.024, 23.84.036, and adding a new Section 23.22.058 to the Land Use Code to implement the City's Environmentally Critical Areas Policies.
